name: Evergreen (liamsorta)
description:
Evergreen is an adaptive RPG where your playthrough is reliant on the players before you, and in turn, your own actions will impact future players.

With just 48 hours, we didn't manage to fit in all the content we wanted, but this is a rough idea of how our mechanic of a world influenced by other players works! Hope you enjoy :)

Controls: 
Movement - WASD
Interact: E

Stay safe!
